name: Escape the Ship! (Jedgar3006)
description:
Deep in space, your ship becomes infested with a swarm of bloodthirsty aliens! Your only choice is to fight them of and escape the ship!

To do this you must collect 9 coloured keys and reach the escape pod at the rear of your ship. These keys will also open new doors in the ship and give you bonuses along the way.

Good luck!

GAME PROGRAMMED BY ME

KEY AND DOOR ICONS BY ME

OTHER GAME ASSETS ARE BORROWED. THIS GAME IS PURELY INTENDED TO DEMONSTRATE MY PROGRAMMING ABILITIES
